mapper.insert: insert into FRAME(fseq, title, content, id) values ((SELECT ifnull(max(fseq), 0) + 1 FROM FRAME a),#{title },#{content },#{id })
insert into FRAME_HAVE_INFO(fhiseq,fseq,inum) values ((SELECT ifnull(max(fhiseq), 0) + 1 FROM FRAME_HAVE_INFO a),(SELECT ifnull(max(fseq), 0) + 0 FROM FRAME b), #{inum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FRAME_HAVE_INFO WHERE FSEQ=${fseq} ORDER BY FHISEQ ASC
SELECT * FROM FRAME WHERE ID=#{id} ORDER BY fseq DESC
